## Key Innovations

1. **Matcher Abstraction Layer** - Plugin architecture for semantic matching
2. **Confidence Calibration** - Learning-based confidence adjustment
3. **Integrated Intelligence** - Multiple AI techniques working together
4. **Historical Learning** - System improves with every use
5. **Type-Safe Matching** - OWL datatype validation
